page.title: 10LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: Wrestlingworth has several timber framed and plaster cottages still standing. Home Farm is probably the oldest house in the village dating from the 15th century. Hill Farm is mentioned in the Victoria History and dates from 1676. Several cottages have thatched roofs and coloured plaster work. Ivy Cottage built 1820 and standing near the school, has just been rethatched. There are several houses dating from early 1900 but most housing is modern and has been built since the end of the Second World War.
